DataElement.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Prophylactic Cranial Irradiation End Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date on which prophylactic cranial radiation therapy ended.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Prophylactic Cranial Irradiation Approach
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the radiation therapy treatment approach that will be used on the head to reduce the risk that cancer will spread to the brain.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: (pro-fih-LAK-tik KRAY-nee-ul ir-ray-dee-AY-shun) Radiation therapy to the head to reduce the risk that cancer will spread to the brain.:a way of entering or leaving.

Concepts.definition: Radiation therapy to the head to reduce the risk that cancer will spread to the brain.
A way of entering or leaving.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: RTOG CRF:Radiation Therapy Oncology Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to NRG for by script Fri Jan 24 11:30:54 EST 2014

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation or an event ended.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
